alerts.description: Send Thank you email KP Generic
Send Thank you email KP Shell

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Status,'NEW - Not Yet Contacted'), 0, IF( ISPICKVAL(Status,'IN PROCESS - 1st Attempt'), 1, IF( ISPICKVAL(Status,'IN PROCESS - 2nd Attempt'), 2, IF( ISPICKVAL(Status,'IN PROCESS - 3rd Attempt'), 3, IF( ISPICKVAL(Status,'IN PROCESS - 4th Attempt'), 4, IF( ISPICKVAL(Status,'IN PROCESS - 5th Attempt'), 5,6))))))
fieldUpdates.name: FieldSalesTerritory_buddy_count

fieldUpdates.formula: IF(ISBLANK (CCS_Cars_up_to_3_5t__c) && ISBLANK (CCS_vans_up_to_3_5t__c), Number_of_Vehicles__c, IF( ISBLANK(CCS_Cars_up_to_3_5t__c) , CCS_vans_up_to_3_5t__c , IF(ISBLANK(CCS_vans_up_to_3_5t__c), CCS_Cars_up_to_3_5t__c, CCS_Cars_up_to_3_5t__c + CCS_vans_up_to_3_5t__c) ))
fieldUpdates.name: CCS_Number_of_vehicles__c Count

fieldUpdates.description: Изменяет статус с Offen на Open
fieldUpdates.name: Open-offen

rules.description: Copy Number_of_vehicles__c to Anzahl_der_Fahrzeuge__c (only for CCS).

rules.formula: IF(ISBLANK(CCS_Cars_up_to_3_5t__c), CCS_Cars_up_to_3_5t__c = 0, CCS_Cars_up_to_3_5t__c = CCS_Cars_up_to_3_5t__c) || IF(ISBLANK (CCS_vans_up_to_3_5t__c) , CCS_vans_up_to_3_5t__c = 0, CCS_vans_up_to_3_5t__c = CCS_vans_up_to_3_5t__c) || IF(ISBLANK (CCS_Cars_up_to_3_5t__c) && ISBLANK (CCS_vans_up_to_3_5t__c), Number_of_Vehicles__c = Number_of_Vehicles__c , Number_of_Vehicles__c = CCS_Cars_up_to_3_5t__c + CCS_vans_up_to_3_5t__c)

rules.description: Take fields from Lead and convert them to other objects (Accounts/Opportunities).
Increments call count when a dialler call has been made with NVM
Email notification for 'PPR Bryansk Call Center' and 'PPR Call Center Team Leader' roles where comes the new lead to the 'PPR Business card' queue and queue name equals 'PPR Business card'
Send email alert to responsible users if a lead is assigned to PPR Email-To-Lead queue
Email notification for 'PPR Bryansk Call Center' and 'PPR Call Center Team Leader' roles where comes the new lead to the 'PPR Partners' queue and queue name equals 'PPR Partners'
Send email to responsible managers if a new lead was assigned on PPR NHF Shell queue
Save the date of lead status last change
Increment the Call Count when the Call Logged checkbox is set to True
Нотификация при попадании лида на очередь PPR Email-To-Lead
date assigned on "PPR Queue transfer Inbound to Outbound"

rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( Owner_User_ID__c ), Owner:User.Profile.Name = 'Russian Call Center')
